        Returns:

      • updateOrder

        public void updateOrder(int index,
                        int clientId,
                        int nit,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> productIds,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> productAmount)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Updates an order's data given its index.
        preThe given index has to exist. productIds and productAmount must have the same size.
        post
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the order that is going to be updated.
        clientId - ID of the client that ordered
        nit - NIT of the restaurant the client ordered at.
        productIds - IDs of the products that will be bought.
        productAmount - Amount of each product.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getSortedClientArray

        public model.Client[] getSortedClientArray()
        Returns an array with all clients sorted in descending order by phone number. Clients are sorted with the Arrays sort and the ClientPhoneComparator.
        Returns:
        array

      • exportOrders

        public void exportOrders(char separator)
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates a file with data from orders. The data is sorted prior to the creation of the file.
        pre The separator must not be a letter or a number
        post The file will be located in data/Orders.csv
        Parameters:
        separator - The separator that will be used in the .csv file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if the file can't be created.
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • importRestaurants

        public void importRestaurants(java.lang.String filename)
                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                              java.io.IOException
        Imports restaurants from the given file. First line will not be read. Splitter is ";"
        pre: Data must have the right format: nit;name;adminName
        pre:
        Parameters:
        filename - Name of the file read.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown if the file isn't found.
        java.io.IOException

        pre: Data must have the right format, as exported with exportOrders()
        pre:
        Parameters:
